trans-unit.source: A Decodable Reader is a book that carefully limits the letters and words used so that it fits what a new reader is ready to read. Typically a language may have 5 - 10 decodable stages through which learners progress.
trans-unit.target: Jun U'jb'il n-nel qniky' jun u'jb'il lu' nim no'k tnab'il tu'n tajb'en qe techl Tz'ib' ex qe yol tu'ntzan jiqnx tz'el tniky' alkye kjawl tsch'i'n jun ak'aj ajsch'il. Noq alkyex jun twitz yol at tuj 5 a 10 kol ma' tuj n-nel qniky' tu'ntzan tlaj nchel wen qe ajxnaq'tzanjtz.

trans-unit.source: Bloom helps you to define this sequence of stages that readers work through. Each book you create will be targeted at one of those stages, and Bloom helps you to make sure that your book is decodable (figure out-able) by learners at that stage.
trans-unit.target: Bloom n-onin ti'je tu'n txi' lapeya ti'j qe qe koln ma' tuj tujtzan jlu' nchik' qe ajsch'il. Qe ju'n u'jb'il nkub' tb'incha'na qajb'ela tujqe ju'n kol ma' tuj lu', ex Bloom qonil tu'n tqe' tk'u'ja qa a tu'jb'ila te n-nel qniky' (jaku tz'el qniky') kyu'nqe ajxnaq'tzanjtz tuj atzankol ma' tuj.

trans-unit.source: You can also make a Bloom Pack of templates that others can use to quickly create books based on the levels and stages that have been prepared by a literacy specialist.
trans-unit.target: Jaka b'ant kub' tb'incha'na jun tenej te Bloom te ttenb'il b'inchil u'jb'il tu'n tajb'en kyu'n junxitl tu'ntzan b'a'nx tu'n tb'ant qe u'jb'il te qe jun wiq kol ch'in tuj ex qe kol ma' tuj, aqetzan jlu' ma' chi b'aj aq'net kyu'nqe e'ln kyniky' ti'j xnaq'tzb'il kye tij xjal.

trans-unit.source: To learn about using Decodable Readers in Bloom, you can:
trans-unit.target: Tu'n qxnaq'tzet tza'n tu'n tajb'en qe u'jb'il n-nel qniky' tuj Bloom, b'a'n:

trans-unit.source: Go to the Help menu, choose 'Documentation', and look in the index under "Decodable Readers".
trans-unit.target: Txi'ya tuj menú te onb'il, sak'onqtza 'Onb'il' ex jyonxa "U'jb'il n-nel qniky'" tuj txolb'ab'il tb'i nab'il.

trans-unit.source: Go to the Help menu and choose: "Building Reader Templates".
trans-unit.target: Txi'ya tuj menú te onb'il, sak'onqtza "N-b'inchet qe ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj".
